data.text: Wuoda, rit wechena
Rit chikena to ibiro bedo mangima;
Twegi e lith lweti kendo ndikgi e chunyi maiye.
Wach ne rieko niya, “In e nyaminwa,”
ginimi itangʼ ni dhako ma jachode,
Ka nangʼicho oko
ne aneno e dier joma ngʼeyogi tin,
Ne owuotho e wangʼ yo makadho but od dhakono,
ka piny ngʼiringʼiri, ka piny dwaro yuso,
Eka apoya nono dhakono nowuok mondo oromne,
En dhako ma wangʼe tek kendo maonge wichkuot,
sani onene e yo, to bangʼ sa matin en kuonde chokruok,
Omiyo nokwake mi onyodhe,
“An gi misango mar lalruok e oda,
Omiyo ne abiro mondo arom kodi,
Asepedho kitandana
Asekiro moo e kitandana,
Bi, wadhi wayud mor mar hera nyaka piny ru,
Chwora ok nitiere dala;
Nokawo mifukone mopongʼ gi pesa,
Kamano, dhakono nowuonde gi weche mamit;
Gikanyono noluwe kodhi kode
nyaka asere chwowe mahob chunye,
Koro un yawuota winjauru,
Kik uyie mondo chunyu odhi e yorene,
Oseketho ngima ji mangʼeny,
Ode en yo malach matero ji e liel,
